title: Reaper Soraka Skin
body:
Will Reaper Raka ever be available again and if so, is there an estimated time of when it would be? I've been dying to get it for almost a year and a half and I missed the last time the legacy vault was open :/.

Epic~

replies.body: My best guess is that she'll be brought back for The Harrowing 2017 which should be happening around Halloween time this year (and every year).
